title: 2 injured after birthday balloons burst into flames in Mumbai lift
desc: Two people suffered burns after a fiery explosion occurred in the lift of a residential building in Mumbai, India, on Monday (Feb 2).According to Times of India, the blast originated from a bag of gas-filled balloons which were brought into the elevator. They were intended for a birthday celebration, the report added.The CCTV footage of the incident shows a woman...

title: Kwakye Ofosu lists reasons why NDC has the best economic record in the 4th Republic
desc: The Minister of Government Communications and Member of Parliament for Abura-Asebu-Kwamankese, Felix Kwakye Ofosu, has outlined why the National Democratic Congress (NDC) holds the strongest economic record in Ghana’s Fourth Republic.

title: MP: CM Mohan Yadav practices Yoga with Swami Ramdev, urges people to make it part of daily routine
desc: Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Mohan Yadav on Thursday participated in a yoga session with Yoga guru Swami Ramdev at Patanjali Yogpeeth in Haridwar and highlighted the importance of yoga in daily life for physical and mental well-being.

title: Drug war reforms prioritize accountability, transparency - Nartatez
desc: PNP chief Gen. Jose Melencio Nartatez Jr. disputes international rights groups’ claims of weak accountability in the drug war, saying police investigations and reforms are actively enforced under the Marcos administration.

title: Beit Shemesh yeshiva student who spied for Iran sentenced to three years in prison
desc: Prosecutors said Elimelech Stern, 21, was in contact on Telegram with an account run by Iranian intelligence and agreed to carry out various tasks in return for payment in cryptocurrency

title: Canon brings back the spotlight on compact cameras with 30th anniversary PowerShot G7 X

title: Life sentence sought for ‘Luffy’ crime ring member
